Annotation

Guide to Codebook

Description

List of terms and definitions used in the documentation. Provided to assist users in using the document correctly. This element was intended to reflect the section in OSIRIS codebooks that assisted users in reading and interpreting a codebook. Each OSIRIS codebook contained a sample codebook page that defined the codebook conventions.
XML Source (w/o annotations (1); see within schema source)
<xs:element name="guide" type="simpleTextType"/>
